title: Android Authority Android Development
description: Android Authority blog dedicated to providing expert tips, Android Development news, reviews and how to guides

title: Android Hive
description: Android Hive is beginner's paradise for android tutorials, tips & tricks, games, hacks and super cool advanced topics along with full source code at single place.

title: Google Android News
description: Comprehensive up-to-date news coverage on android development, aggregated from sources all over the world by Google News.

title: Android Arsenal
description: A categorized directory of libraries and tools for Android.

title: Android Weekly
description: This free weekly newsletter includes everything from articles and tutorials to videos and GitHub libraries. It’s a must-subscribe for Android developers of all skill levels.

title: JustMobileDev Blog
description: Deep-dive tutorials and some personal bits and pieces from Chris Scheid's personal blog.

title: Antonio Leiva
description: Learn Android advanced topics in a fast and easy way! Articles and examples written with love. Material Design, MVP, Kotlin.

title: Dan Lew Codes
description: Dan Lew is an Android software developer at Trello, a visual collaboration tool that creates a shared perspective on any project. In this blog, he shares code as well as thoughts on life, the universe and the mystery of it all.

title: MobileDev Memo
description: Mobile Dev Memo is the site of record for the mobile app development and marketing industry but they also publish their own posts which cover a range of engagement topics.

title: Fragmented
description: You’ll find something new to learn about android development every time you visit Fragmented Podcast. Donn Felker and Kaushik Gopal often engage other Android developers on the same on a biweekly basis.

title: Cyril Mottier
description: This blog mainly focus on creating polished, pixel-perfect, smooth and responsive applications helping end users achieve their goals painlessly and, more importantly, as quickly as possible.
